attributes.action: Require bus companies to use only zero emission or hybrid buses by 2030
attributes.additional_details:
I ask that the UK government requires bus companies across England to use only zero emission single decker buses and zero emission/hybrid double decker buses by 2030 at the absolute latest. This should help us to meet a target of zero emissions by 2050, which many scientists argue is absolutely necessary to ensure a future for our planet (B).
(A): TfL website 
(B): https://amp.theguardian.com/environment/2019/may/02/do-it-now-uk-must-set-zero-carbon-target-for-2050-say-official-advisers
attributes.background: Transport for London has already announced that from 2020, all single decker buses entering service will be zero emission (electric or hydrogen) - (A). As Parliament has declared a ‘climate emergency’, it is only right that we set ambitious goals for clean buses across the whole of England.
